name: 1nvit3d
description:
1nvit3d is a puzzle game, where you type in commands, and W0rdB0t follows them!

Are you a keyboard warrior? Do you like puzzle games? Then this game is for you!

In 1nvit3d you are a robot that needs to get through twisted and dangerous levels to... (I'm not going to spoil that for you)

Be careful and avoid the spikes but collect the coins, because you need at least 20 coins and be fast, because you don't have much time to spare!

All the assets are made by me for this game jam.

A game made by MihaiTGP#0001
